item.title: Building a Website as a Firmware Developer
item.description: If you haven’t guessed from the title I’m not well versed in building websites. In fact, this is really the first website I’ve made “from scratch” and even this isn’t really a from-scratch website. This adventure started when a friend, John, built a site to house his blog. I had wanted to start blogging but for one reason or another, I wouldn’t. Id open medium or dev.to or whatever log in and look at the blank page and freeze.
